title.rendered: CHLOE AW22 – Street Style At Paris Fashion Week 2022

content.rendered:
24Fashion TV brings you the most stylish of the guests who attended the live fashion show for CHLOE AW22.


Photojournalist: Christina V Henningstad @christina_henningstad. Production: Fashionview for 24Fashion.tv

excerpt.rendered: 24Fashion TV brings you the most stylish of the guests who attended the live fashion…
